title: Zion
verses:
1. Lo! he comes, with clouds descending, Once for
Thousand, thousand saints attending, Swell the
favored sinners slain! Hallelujah! Jesus
triumph of his train;
comes, and comes to reign. Hallelujah!

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Celebrates Christ's triumphant return with clouds and attending saints, a central theme of Adventist hope and expectation
